sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="sysauto_script"> <sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <condition/> <conditional>false</conditional> <name>Managed Services GetRfc</name> <run_as display_value="priyanka ">e75da407db213200ef73d8c0cf961959</run_as> <run_as_tz/> <run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth> <run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek> <run_period/> <run_start>2017-04-12 13:22:36</run_start> <run_time>1970-01-01 09:00:00</run_time> <run_type>on_demand</run_type> <script><![CDATA[// Call AMSRfcFetch script var amsGetRfcApi = new AMSRfcFetch(); //Fetch VpcId from VPC table var grRfcId = new GlideRecord('x_109369_ams_rfcs'); grRfcId.query(); while(grRfcId.next()) { //Call getRFC API var getRFCInsert = amsGetRfcApi.getRfcAndInsert(grRfcId.u_rfcs_id.toString()); if(!getRFCInsert) { if ('true' == gs.getProperty('debug.AMSRestCalls'))// No rfcs Found gs.info("Debug >>>AMS GetRfc :"+grRfcId.u_rfcs_id+" is not inserted"); } } ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>priyanka</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-04-12 13:24:16</sys_created_on> <sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update> <sys_id>113dd3c2dbca7200ef73d8c0cf96198c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Managed Services GetRfc</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="AMS" source="x_109369_ams">5b693bf9db427200ef73d8c0cf961927</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade> <sys_scope display_value="AMS">5b693bf9db427200ef73d8c0cf961927</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sysauto_script_113dd3c2dbca7200ef73d8c0cf96198c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>sahitya</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-05-17 09:49:31</sys_updated_on> <upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe> </sysauto_script> </record_update>
